events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further consideration.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile to assist you throughout the hiring process.
We completed your initial screening interview, discussing your software development experience and skills.
Thank you for your prompt response and for answering our questions in the screening phase.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th. Prepare to discuss system design and coding.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong software engineering skills.
Your HR interview is scheduled for May 15th to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview was completed successfully, and you expressed enthusiasm about joining our team.
We have extended a formal offer for the Software Engineer role, including competitive compensation and benefits.
We received your positive feedback regarding the offer and your excitement about joining the company.
You have accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as a new Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has begun with orientation sessions and setup of engineering tools.
The hiring process is now complete and we look forward to your contributions as part of our engineering team.
